Send word to Alangoya immediately. Let
him kill Ertuğrul and his children too. When I
go to Anatolia, I will trample over their graves.

text: Nene, bak, iyice ata binmeye başladım.
english: Grandma, look, I've really started to get into horseback riding.
time passes, just like my Ertuğrul...
...my Gündüz reins in the wild horses. Please
From now on, you are considered the lady of this tent. That is

text: Bu sebeptendir ki senin obada kalmanı isterim.
english: why I want you to stay in the camp .
Do not stand among other men.
Thank you, Hayme Ana. You can't imagine
how pleased you've made me. I'm

text: Obada kalmamı isteyecek kadar beni yakın görmenizden pek mutlu oldum.
english: very happy that you consider me close enough to ask me to stay in Oba.
But I don't want to be a burden to you. I'll
still come and go. What kind of

text: Aksine sen bize hep yardımcı olursun.
english: On the contrary, you always help us. There is always a place for

text: Senin gibi bir hatuna Ertuğrul Bey'in obasında her vakit yer vardır.
english: a woman like you in Ertuğrul Bey's tribe.

text: Madem öyle dersiniz, o vakit ben de obanızı obam, sizi anam bilirim.
english: If you say so, then I will consider your tribe my tribe , and you my mother. That's better

text: Yarından tezi yok sana da bir çadır hazırlatalım, ha?
english: a tent set up for you starting tomorrow , okay?

text: -Günalp Bey. -Ne oldu, ne oldu Günalp Bey?
english: Mr. Günalp. -What happened, what happened, Mr. Günalp?

text: Bizim topraklarımıza sızmaya kalkan bir Moğol casusudur Hayme Ana.
english: Hayme Ana is a Mongol spy who attempted to infiltrate our lands.

text: Ertuğrul Bey gelene kadar onu kafesli çadırda tutacağım.
english: I will keep him in the caged tent until Ertuğrul Bey arrives.

text: Günalp Bey, Konya'dan ulak olarak geliriz.
english: Mr. Günalp, we come as messengers from Konya.

text: Sultanımız yeni bir vazife için beni Konya'ya çağırır.
english: Our Sultan summons me to Konya for a new assignment.
Please convey my greetings to Ertuğrul Bey. Yes, sir

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Deh! Deh! (At nalı sesleri)

english: Let's rest the horses before they collapse.
We need to get to the boat before them. They

text: Atları yoktur beyim, evelallah onlardan evvel varırız tekneye.
english: don't have horses, sir; God willing, we'll reach the boat before them. Let's

text: Gardaş, bu Almıla kahpesini beyimize diyelim.
english: Brother, let's tell our master about this whore Almıla. Just
wait a moment, Bamsi, we'll tell you.

text: Neden Ögeday'a teklifini kabul ettiğini söyledin?
english: Why did you tell Ögeday that you accepted his offer ? With the
peace treaty, I wanted to buy time until Ögeday...

text: ...ordularıyla topraklarımıza saldırana kadar vakit kazanmak istedim Turgut.
english: ...attacked our lands with his armies, Turgut.
If I had told Ögeday what was on my mind ... ...the survival
of the state would have been jeopardized.

text: Noyan'ın topraklarımıza ne kadar sızdığını öğrenmek istedim.
english: I wanted to find out how far Noyan had infiltrated our territory.

text: Lakin benim bir oyun ettiğimden şüphe ettiği için...
english: But because he suspected I was playing a trick...

not only our lands... but even our
Ertuğrul's blessed child. I will kill
Now you will be my first victim.

text: Tez obaya, hayde yetişmemiz lazım, hayde!
